prompts.prompt: Give a daily agenda overview for {date}: list my meetings, the time and location of each, and indicate if any important emails or flagged tasks are related to these meetings.

template.name: daily-agenda-with-context
template.title: Daily agenda with context
template.description: Provides a schedule for a given date, enriched with related emails and tasks to help prepare.

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: The date for the agenda overview (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

prompts.prompt: Identify any upcoming calendar events in the next {days} days that involve the sender {emailAddress}, and summarize recent email threads with this person to prepare for the meetings.

template.name: meeting-prep-with-contact
template.title: Meeting prep with contact
template.description: Prepares user for meetings with a specific person by combining upcoming events and recent email context.

arguments.name: days
arguments.description: Number of days to look ahead in the calendar.

arguments.name: emailAddress
arguments.description: The email address of the contact.
